title: NEW Teemo Skin Idea, "FINDING TEEMO"
body:
Okay, so...

Teemo needs a new skin. And what better than a skin that kinda makes sense along with the name?
So I came up with FINDING TEEMO. FINDING NEMO. C'mon guys, stick with me.

Now shortly after I thought about this I googled it, and didn't see any concept art for him at all.

So picture this!

It's called "Finding Teemo". Now Teemo's passive allows him to turn invisible when he stands still, so when that happens the first thing you think is, "WELL SHIT. WHERE IS TEEMO. I HAVE TO FIND HIM." Well when he enters his passive it can be called "Finding Teemo" due to him being Invisible and you not knowing where the hell he is.

So some more ideas for this is his Shrooms, they HAVE to be Sea Urchins. If anyone out there doesn't know why this is a must, its because Sea Urchins ARE POISONOUS. And if you step on one you're screwed, just like Teemo's Shrooms.

Next, I figured his Blowpipe can be a long piece of coral, as you can see in my picture. I feel like it would compliment his skin along with his name. Also his darts can be Urchin Quills. Some Species of Sea Urchin toxins can cause blindness if you step on one so it MAKES SENSE for his "Q".

His "W" like on Super Teemo, he flies. So when maxed out on Finding Teemo he can like hover with a motion and swim!

When Teemo recalls he can swim around in little circles.

I took the time to draw out this picture and then draw it up in illustrator to kind give you guys an idea of what exactly I have in mind. SO lemme hear your feedback, and lets bump this up!

replies.body: This is so awesome! I can see him waddling around on his fins when he walks!
Sadly enough if we find him planting his shrooms around the map we'll put his head on a pike and roast him on an iron spit. Smite in Season 5 Jungle is a good tool to start a cooking fire.

> [{quoted}](name=yupster,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7v0xsxpX,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2014-10-27T23:17:18.431+0000)
>
> This is so awesome! I can see him waddling around on his fins when he walks!

Me too xD
!!! YES. YES. YES.
PLEASE MAKE THIS RITO! it's been a while since panda teemo came out, we could use this soooo much, IT'S SO CUTEEEEE

>teemo needs a new skin

There's your first problem
I disagree, he needs a new skin.  The keyword is NEW not SKIN. He hasn't had a new skin for more than 2 years

Okay, but you can't discount the fact that he already has seven skins, one of which is greater than 975 RP in value.

The second problem with the skin you've proposed is that it's a copyright issue, and with Disney no less. Riot can't pull that like they used to closer to League of Legends' inception (Veigar Greybeard and Frozen Shen are examples of skins that would not fly if a company who cared chose to take legal action).
how about we just kill teemo.  kill it with fire.

I'm not saying Teemo isn't a pain but this whole "hate Teemo" thing has really gone on for a long time. There are now 121 champs. I hardly ever see a Teemo anymore. And Riot nerfed him. He's not as scary anymore.
And until he is deleted we cannot stop.  We cannot rest, lest he return to prominence.  We must do our duty.

But he's so cute. And market-able.

Teemo merchandise.
You are totally right.  Let's start with a statue of Teemo with a button and when you press it Darius comes down from the sky and cuts him in two.
Glorious idea, let it be know from now that the teemo statue shall be 15 feet tall and the darius statue which guillotines teemo be 60 feet tall with a 45 foot tall axe.
Needs to be bigger
Tickle Me Teemo. Spams the same laugh he has in game when you poke his belly. Rito pls!

> how about we just kill teemo.  kill it with fire.

Sunfire cape XD{{item:3068}}
slowly roast him while he uses his passive in a bush
Recall: he goes to touch the butt.
Es-cop-eh
LMAO this is literally genius, thank you based Shipwrecks
100/1 would buy, pls Riot
Maybe you could have Jellyfish instead of Urchins, like in the movie.  Jellyfish aren't poisonous, but they do sting and it is continuous with the movie.

> Maybe you could have Jellyfish instead of Urchins, like in the movie.  Jellyfish aren't poisonous, but they do sting and it is continuous with the movie.

not to mention anything that makes people play teemo more i hate

Coming from the guy who only ever buys 1 skin a half year, this is probably one of the best ideas I've ever seen. I hope it happens.
What if we changed the urchins to Jellyfish and have him say "This is my squishy" when he puts them down.
If you type in funny skins for league of legends you can actually see finding teemo on websites. Last time I saw they didn't have any arts for it tho

The little shit doesn't need anymore skins.
